LessonActivity.LessonName: Fill in the Morph with -AN Words
LessonActivity.Instructions: Read the sentences and fill in the blanks with appropriate words from the word bank.
Sentences: I checked my _____________ to find the correct spelling.
The weather forecast will _____________ rain tomorrow.
The _____________ issued a new law for all citizens.
There is a _____________ between what he said and what he did.
She will _____________ the terms of the agreement.
